aboutDescription: Hello! I'm Elodie(Shunfei Zhang), a senior UX designer specializing in enterprise process innovation and consumer experience alchemy, based in Hangzhou, China.
With 6 years of crafting mission-critical interfaces for giants like Huawei Cloud and Geely Auto, I transform tangled business workflows into intuitive digital journeys.

projects.description: Built from scratch for Lanchuang Tech, this retail management platform standardized asset management and reduced cross-role communication time by 40%. Featured in 200+ stores across China.
Transformed Geely's outsourcing recruitment from chaotic multi-tool workflow to unified platform. Cut process steps by 60% through component-based design system across web/applet platforms.
Increased user activity by 45% through redesigned community module. Implemented Q&A ecosystem and reward mechanics that boosted authentic UGC by 3x while reducing official content dependency.

data.contactParagraph: I'm currently open to work and get involved in new projects, so get in touch if you'd like to Hire me or work together.
